Class Settings

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.Settings
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Settings
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

    Settings.java

    Coordinates with the UI to look for selected colors and initializes players accordingly
    Author:
    Dhruv Bhagat 2016146, Sushant Kumar Singh 2016103
    See Also:

      • setColor

        public void setColor(java.lang.String color,
                     int playerNumber)
              throws NonUniqueColorException
        Sets the colors of the player ,called during initialization of players
        Parameters:
        color - First parameter,denotes String value of color
        playerNumber - Second parameter,denotes the PlayerNumber
        Throws:
        NonUniqueColorException - exception thrown when 2 or more players click/want to choose the same color

      • getColor

        public java.lang.String getColor(int playerNumber)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        color assigned to player in accordance with the player number
